join.title: Join
join.description: Joins the voice channel you are connected to if able to

errors.failed: :no_entry_sign: Could not connect to voice channel: `{0}`
errors.noChannel: :no_entry_sign: You must be connected to a voice channel to use this command

leave.title: Leave
leave.description: Leaves the voice channel you are connected to

errors.noChannel: :no_entry_sign: Could not find a voice channel you are connected to

loop.title: Loop
loop.description: Gets or sets the loop mode for the server

errors.notValid:
:no_entry_sign: Sorry, that is not a valid looping mode.
Valid loop modes are: {0}

noMessage.title: No Message
noMessage.description: Sets whether or not to say when the next song plays

errors.notOption:
:no_entry_sign: Incorrect option, make sure to use only:
`yes` `no` `on` and `off`
errors.noQueue:
:no_entry_sign: There is no option to set.
Make sure the bot is playing music first.

play.title: Play
play.description: Searches YouTube for the song requested or adds song to queue
play.noResults: :x: Sorry, no results were found for your query: `{0}`

errors.searchFail: :no_entry_sign: Could not connect to YouTube, an error has occured. Please try again later.
errors.incorrectURL: :no_entry_sign: Could not read video from URL.

nowplaying.title: NowPlaying
nowplaying.description: Gets the current queue for the server
nowplaying.noSongs: There are no songs in queue.
nowplaying.noPlaying: :minidisc: There are no songs playing right now. You can queue songs using the `play` command.

select.title: Select
select.description: Selects a song searched by the `play` command

errors.notIndex: :no_entry_sign: Sorry that item does not exist, make sure to select from: {0}
